footer.financeInfo: The project is financed by the Operational Program "Good Governance", co-financed by the European Union, through the European Social Fund in implementation of project No. BG05SFOP001-1.017 "Creation, upgrading and consolidation of electronic registers of the National Information and Documentation Center (NACID) in the field of higher education"

feedback.title: Feedback form
feedback.email: Your e-mail address necessary for the feedback
feedback.topic: Topic of the message or enquiry

repeatable.passwordRequirements: Password must consist of atleast 6 symbols, a digit, uppercase and lowercase letter

changeEmailAddress.title: Change email address
changeEmailAddress.description: After changing your email, you will only be able to log in this portal with your new email. The change will automatically be entered in the Register of all active, interrupted and graduated students and doctoral students. The new email will be visible to all universities and/or research organizations where you study.

changeName.title: Change names
changeName.description: The change in your names will also be entered in the Register of all active, interrupted and graduated students and doctoral students and will be visible to the universities and/or research organizations where you study. Your new names are extracted from the NDB "Population" of DG "GRAO" and cannot be edited.

logHistory.searchedFrom: Your NESC was checked from these IP adresses:

toastrError.UserIncorrectBirthDate: The date of birth does not correspond to the date submitted to the university!
toastrError.StudentNotFoundByUAN: University or PhD student with the given UAN was not found in the database of the registry!
toastrError.NotAccessForRequestedDiploma: You cannot access the selected diploma!
toastrError.NewEmailActivationTokenAlreadyUsed: Email changing token is already used!
toastrError.NewPasswordRecoveryTokenAlreadyUsed: Passport recovery link is already used!
toastrError.UserRegisterNotFoundWithGivenIdentificat: A record of an active university/PhD student with this ID was not found in Register of all active, interrupted and graduated students and doctoral students. Please contact your university/scientific organization or NACID using the feedback form.
toastrError.UserRegisterEmailMismatch_1: The email you entered does not match the email in your record (
toastrError.UserRegisterEmailMismatch_2: ) in the Register of all active, interrupted and graduated students and doctoral students. If you are not certain what is your email in the register or whether it is the correct one, please contact your university/scientific organization.
toastrError.UserRegisterEmailNotFoundInRDPZSD: Your university/scientific organization has not entered an email in your record in the Register of all active, interrupted and graduated students and doctoral students. The activation of your account in the National electronic student card system cannot be completed. Please contact your university/scientific organization.
toastrError.UserAlreadyHasProfileWIthGivenUan: An account with the ID you entered has already been activated. If you are not able to reset your password using the “Forgotten password” section, please contact your university/scientific organization or NACID using the feedback form.
toastrError.UserRegisterNotActive: A record of an active university/PhD student with this ID was not found in Register of all active, interrupted and graduated students and doctoral students.

EAuthResponseStatus.NoEgnMatch: User with given PIN is not found!

toastrError.NoDifferenceFoundInNames: In the National Database "Population" there is no information about your names being changed.
toastrError.RegiXConnectionFailed: Problem with extracting data from NBD „Population“ of DG „GRAO“
toastrError.EmptyRegixResponse: Problem with extracting data from NBD „Population“ of DG „GRAO“
toastrError.UnableToSendEmail: An error occured while sending the feedback message.

toastrSuccess.UserLinkForActivation: Activation link sent to the user
toastrSuccess.UserChangeNewEmail: Activation link is sent to the new email address
toastrSuccess.UserActivateNewEmail: Successfully changed email! When logging in again, use the new email address
toastrSuccess.UserRequestedRegister: You will receive an email with the activation link for your account in the National electronic student card system. If you do not receive the email, please check in your Spam folder or contact NACID using the feedback form.

validations.email: Please, enter a valid email address

basic.title: Personal information
basic.missingImg: The university has not submitted your photo

electronicCard.title: Electronic student card
electronicCard.textInfo: To check the data, scan the QR code or use the EAN on
electronicCard.textForNonActive: This service is only avaliable for active university/PhD students

eAuthentication.message: After clicking the button "Continue" you will be redirected to the eAuthentication website. There you have to choose the preffered for you metod for authentication.

application.info_first: In this section of the Portal you can check the validity of the card of university/PhD students in Bulgaria by entering their UAN in the field

student.noActiveEducation: In the register of all active, interrupted and graduated students and doctoral students no information was found that the person is an active student or doctoral student in the Republic of Bulgaria.
